#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Host a Family Gathering
#Text=Family gatherings can be a chance for family members to reconnect and bond with each other .
#Text=If you happen to be hosting one , here are some tips to help you plan and host a fun reunion of your immediate family .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be precise but flexible when inviting family members .
#Text=In too many situations , hosts can be overly unclear on arriving times , or they can be too strict .
#Text=The best thing to do is create a window of time that is appropriate for a guest to arrive at your house .
#Text=Do n't make all the food yourself .
#Text=Ask a person in each family unit to prepare a dish .
#Text=If they are famous for a certain dish in your family , ask them to make that .
#Text=Keep an even balance between appetizers , entrees , and desserts .
#Text=Decide what parts of your house are off-limits .
#Text=Inform each person as they walk in your door , and if you feel the need , make signs and tape them to doors of off-limits areas .
#Text=Keep children in mind .

#Text=Chances are that small children may be running around your house , and since the adults will most likely going to be occupied , leave out some child-friendly toys and activities in a common space , like a living room .
#Text=These items could be :
#Text=Board games
#Text=Toy cars or blocks
#Text=Video games
#Text=Television ( block all inappropriate channels )
#Text=Privately tell an older child , minimum age 12 , that they need to keep an eye on younger kids .
#Text=This will retain order in rooms where there is not constant adult supervision .
#Text=You can include a small monetary incentive , like $ 2 per hour .
#Text=Remind them not to be too “ bossy ” and to simply resolve small quarrels and retrieve adult help in case of problems on a bigger scale , like physical fighting or injuries .
#Text=This also gives a preteen a sense of importance , which is always good .
#Text=Purchase assorted crackers , chips , cheeses and dips .
#Text=Display them nicely on a coffee table or in a dining room .
#Text=This can be a common space where all guests are allowed , which gives them an opportunity to converse and bond , which is the goal of your party .
#Text=Create an adult dinner table and a kid 's dinner table .

#Text=Chances are that you will not have room for all family members to dine together in the same room , so the practical thing to do is seat the children in the kitchen and the adults in the formal dining room .
#Text=Remember to check in on the kids occasionally .
#Text=Finally , say goodbye to all your guests as they leave your house .
#Text=This may be the last impression they have of you for a while , and you never know when you will see them again .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=A clean , childproof house
#Text=Appetizers , entrees , and desserts
#Text=Patience
